Html:
Hi Guys,

 

As I am new towards PRISM can please tell me what is the use of Import & Export Attribute in Mef.

 

Thank you

 

sirfmemon

Well documentation for prism has great wealth of information as well as the sample applications that are shipped with prism v4.  They demonstrate the use of Import/Export and also show the other Attributes that maybe necessary for use in your application.

 

morgan.

Hi sirfmemon,

What Morgan is saying is right. The documentation he's referring to is mainly in this article. You could also check the Prism Training Kit, which has a lab entirely dedicated to MEF, and finally, there is a MEF Codeplex project which also has thorough documentation.

I hope you find this useful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
